channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Crypto to play 'major role' in UAE trade: foreign trade Minister
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.category: UAE minister of state for foreign trade
item.description: UAE’s minister of state for foreign trade Thani Al-Zeyoudi noted that as the country has attracted a lot of talent from the crypto sector, the UAE now needs to roll out the correct regulation to support further growth.

item.title: Bitcoin price rally provides much needed relief for BTC miners
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: Bitcoin’s prolonged breakout above $22,000 is easing pressure on razor thin profit margins for BTC miners.

item.title: Stellar joins CFTC’s Global Markets Advisory Committee as one of four crypto orgs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Stellar chief operating officer Jason Chlipala said the foundation would bring the unique perspective of Layer 1 to the committee and highlight stablecoin use cases.

item.title: DeFi should complement TradFi, not attack it: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Top 100 DeFi tokens continued their bullish momentum into third week of January with majority of the tokens trading in green on weekly charts.

item.title: Genesis’ bankruptcy filing was decided by independent committee, according to DCG
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: A special committee of independent directors recommended and decided to file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.

item.title: Crypto Biz: SBF’s newest Excel spreadsheet reveals all
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: FTX's debtors are applying "Herculean" effort to unearth the exchange's remaining assets. Meanwhile, Sam Bankman-Fried claims FTX US is solvent.

item.title: Opinion: Digital Currency Group's Genesis implosion: What comes next?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Bradley
item.description: Genesis, a subsidiary of Barry Silbert's Digital Currency Group, filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy on Jan. 19. Its default could have big implications for the crypto industry.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: is the Bitcoin bear market over
item.description: Bitcoin price is up today after traders decided that the Genesis bankruptcy news was already priced in and unlikely to severely impact BTC price.

item.title: SEC charges Mango Markets exploiter for allegedly stealing $116M in crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The SEC has accused Avraham Eisenberg of manipulating the Mango Markets platform by manipulating the MNGO token, which the company allegedly sold as a security.

item.title: Price analysis 1/20: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, DOT, LTC, AVAX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and altcoins appear to have shaken off the Genesis bankruptcy news by bouncing off their immediate support levels and rallying higher.

item.title: GameFi needs a wider choice of products to take off, says Animoca Brands CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: A wider choice of quality games is needed to bring the masses into GameFi, according to Robby Yung, CEO of Animoca Brands.

item.title: FTX bankruptcy lawyer: debtors face 'assault by Twitter' stemming from Sam Bankman-Fried
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The judge ruled there were no potential conflicts of interest sufficient to stop Sullivan & Cromwell from continuing to act as the debtors' counsel.

item.title: Bitcoin eyes $21.4K zone as analyst predicts BTC price will chase gold
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin's trading range is "well defined" on exchanges but there is scope for a further breakout to copy gold.

item.title: NFT Steez and Cryptoys CEO discuss the future of toys and entertainment within Web3
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alyssa Exposito
item.category: future of play cryptoys and blockchain
item.description: NFT Steez chats with Cryptoys CEO Will Weinraub about the future of toys, entertainment and play in blockchain-based games.

item.title: Bitcoin mining in a university dorm: A cooler BTC story
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: Here is why a run-of-the-mill cooler is actually the perfect home for a dorm-based Bitcoin miner.

item.title: Former FTX US president raises $5M for new crypto software firm
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: Brett Harrison departed FTX US roughly two months before FTX Group filed for bankruptcy, citing "cracks" in his relationship with SBF.

item.title: 10 ways blockchain developers can use ChatGPT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: AI is a powerful tool that developers in the cryptocurrency and blockchain industry can use. Here is how ChatGPT can be of help.

item.title: Is “The Howey Test” outdated? Modernizing regulations for the digital age
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arie Trouw
item.description: The rate and reach of cryptocurrency adoption in recent years signals the dire need for modern regulation that simultaneously safeguards investors and enables innovation to flourish.

item.title: Genesis bankruptcy filing sparks various community responses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A crypto analyst illustrated how crypto firms were potentially connected throughout all the recent bankruptcies.

item.title: Sundance Film Festival embraces blockchain and crypto film initiatives
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Film festivals have seen an increase in blockchain and crypto-funded film projects and initiatives as Web3 technologies continue to merge with the entertainment industry.

item.title: Bybit CEO offers clarity on exposure to Genesis, but community demands more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The community questioned Bybit’s timing in revealing their exposure, with many demanding proof to back up the reassurance from the CEO.

item.title: NFT sales topped 101 million in 2022: DappRadar report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: A recent report from DappRadar revealed that over the last year, NFT and gaming-centered decentralized applications rivaled DeFi DApps on many major blockchains.

item.title: Crypto becomes second most widely-owned asset class for women: eToro survey
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: While crypto is dubbed the worst-performing asset class in the last year, global investors owning crypto rose from 36% to 39% on a quarter-on-quarter basis.

item.title: FTX reboot could falter due to long-broken user trust, say observers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Crypto industry observers have questioned whether customers or investors will ever want to “come near” FTX again.

item.title: Nifty News: Trump NFTs surge 800%, Yuga Labs blacklists NFT exchanges and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: Donald Trump’s NFT collection started strong but looked lifeless until a few days ago.

item.title: Ransom refusals hit attackers where it hurts: 40% revenue drop in 2022 — Chainalysis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.category: United States Office of Foreign Assets Control
item.description: A number of industry pundits believe the U.S. Office of Foreign Assets Control’s threat to impose sanctions has victims thinking twice about paying up.

item.title: Daring drive-by at SBF’s: 3 men drove into barricade and fled: Lawyers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The lawyers didn’t specify the date or time when the incident took place, and claimed that security personnel was unable to get the license plate details.

item.title: Crypto lender Genesis files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Crypto lender Genesis Global has become the latest firm to throw in the towel following the collapse of FTX, filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in New York.

item.title: Former FTX chief lawyer claims US legal counsel channeled business to S&C
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The former chief regulatory officer of FTX has supported a motion that would stop FTX from using Sullivan & Cromwell as its lead bankruptcy counsel.

item.title: Crypto could solve venture capital’s due diligence problem — VC exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Due diligence has always been an issue in the venture capital space according to a VC executive, but crypto offers a solution: A public and immutable ledger.
